response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and enhance your business operations significantly. With its advanced features and capabilities, it has proven to be invaluable to our existing clients. Given its high quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our confidence in its ability to positively impact your endeavors. Please let me know if this aligns with your budget and expectations, or if there's any way I can assist you further.", "product_price": 7500}
